alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LANCASTER AND CENTRAL YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over York, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stonybrook-Wilshire, Valley View and East York around 605 PM EDT. Mount Wolf and Manchester around 610 PM EDT. Yorklyn around 615 PM EDT. Bainbridge, Hallam and Yorkana around 620 PM EDT. Maytown, Marietta and Wrightsville around 630 PM EDT. Elizabethtown around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include York Haven, Elizabethtown College, York College Of Pennsylvania, Penn State York and Washington Boro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
